creator: Maria Parloa; Janet McKenzie Hill
description:
LibriVox recording of Chocolate and Cocoa Recipes and Home Made Candy Recipes by Maria Parloa; Janet McKenzie Hill.
Read in English by ashleighjane; Cori Samuel; Peter Yearsley; David Lawrence; BookAngel7; Joanne Rochon
A selection of chocolate recipes which were produced for Walter Baker & Co, the oldest producer of chocolate in the United States. Advertisements used by Walter Baker & Co can be found in Section 7. They are read by: Cori Samuel, Peter Why, David Lawrence, BookAngel7, ashleighjane and Joanne Rochon. (Summary by ashleighjane)
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

M4B Format Available
subject: librivox; audiobooks;instruction; cookery; recipes; cooking; baking; chocolate; cookbook; bakers chocolate; desserts; vintage cookbook
